an8.77:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an8.77:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an8.77:2.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirayattavuttino iccha uppajjati labhaya.
an8.77:2.5: Tassa utthahato, ghatato, vayamato labhaya labho nuppajjati.
an8.77:2.6: So tena alabhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati.
an8.77:2.7: Ayam vuccatavuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati labhaya, utthahati, ghatati, vayamati labhaya, na ca labhi, soci ca paridevi ca, cuto ca saddhamma’.
an8.77:3.1: Idha panavuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirayattavuttino iccha uppajjati labhaya.
an8.77:3.3: Tassa utthahato ghatato vayamato labhaya labho uppajjati.
an8.77:3.4: So tena labhena majjati pamajjati pamadamapajjati.
an8.77:3.5: Ayam vuccatavuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati labhaya, utthahati ghatati vayamati labhaya, labhi ca, madi ca pamadi ca, cuto ca saddhamma’.
